# showsMicrophoneButton

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the microphone button is visible in the broadcast picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var showsMicrophoneButton: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Configuring the Broadcast Picker

- **preferredExtension**: A bundle identifier of a broadcast extension.
